dublin_core.dcvalue: Zachariah Jezman, CCPF Project Manager, VillageReach, Email: zachariah.jezman@villagereach.org | Fannie Kachale, Director Reproductive Health, Malawi Ministry of Health, Email: fankachale@yahoo.co.uk

CCPF provides regular tips and reminders via mobile text or voice messages on reproductive, maternal and newborn health topics. Messages are tailored to the client's week of pregnancy or a child's age.

WHO’s Innovation Working Group, UN Foundation; Concern Worldwide’s Innovations for Maternal, Newborn and Child Health
Chipatala Cha Pa Foni (Health center By Phone)
Client education and behavior change communication, Maternal Health, Newborn Health, Child Health
